sen.j: 九世野村万蔵（のむら まんぞう 1965年12月23日 -）とは、和泉流狂言師。
sen.e: Manzo NOMURA, the ninth (December 23, 1965 - present) is the kyogen performer of Izumi school.
Manzo NOMURA, the Ninth (December 23, 1965 - present) is a kyogen performer of the Izumi school.
sen.cmt: the Ninth、a kyogen performer of the Izumi schoolとしました。
sen.e: Manzo NOMURA, the Ninth (December 23, 1965 - present) is a kyogen performer of the Izumi school.
He is Yojuro NOMURA, the second.
He is Yojuro NOMURA, the Second.
He is Yojuro NOMURA, the Second.
He is 44 years old.
He is 44 years old.
He is 44 years old.
His real name is Ryosuke NOMURA.
His real name is Ryosuke NOMURA.
His real name is Ryosuke NOMURA.

sen.j: 野村萬（野村万蔵 (7世)）の次男として東京都に生まれる。
sen.e: He was born as the second son of Man NOMURA (Manzo NOMURA (the seventh)) in Tokyo Prefecture.
He was born as the second son of Man NOMURA (Manzo NOMURA [the Seventh]) in Tokyo Prefecture.
sen.cmt: the Seventhとし、カッコ表記修正
sen.e: He was born as the second son of Man NOMURA (Manzo NOMURA [the Seventh]) in Tokyo Prefecture.

sen.j: 2000年、万蔵家の分家である野村与左衛門家を150年ぶりに再興して二世与十郎を襲名した。
sen.e: In 2000, he succeeded to Yojuro, the second by restoring Yozaemon NOMURA family, a branch family of Manzo family, in 150 years.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: In 2000, he succeeded to Yojuro, the Second by restoring Yozaemon NOMURA family, a branch family of the Manzo family, in 150 years.
sen.cmt: the Second、the Manzo familyとしました。
sen.e: In 2000, he succeeded to Yojuro, the Second by restoring Yozaemon NOMURA family, a branch family of the Manzo family, in 150 years.

sen.j: しかし、兄・野村万蔵の死去にともなって2005年に九世野村万蔵を襲名。
sen.e: However, he succeeded to Manzo NOMURA, the ninth, due to his older brother Manzo NOMURA's death in 2005.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: However, he succeeded to Manzo NOMURA, the Ninth, due to his older brother Manzo NOMURA's death in 2005.
However, he succeeded to Manzo NOMURA, the Ninth, due to his older brother Manzo NOMURA's death in 2005.

sen.j: 重要無形文化財総合指定。
sen.e: He is the general holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property.
He is the general holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property.
He is the general holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property.
He is the member of the Noh Association.
He is a member of the Nohgaku Performers' Association.
sen.cmt: the member→a member、Noh Association→Nohgaku Performers' Associationとしました。
sen.e: He is a member of the Nohgaku Performers' Association.

sen.j: 東京藝術大学、桜美林大学、劇団青年座講師。
sen.e: He is the instructor of Tokyo School of Fine Arts, Obirin University, and Seinenza Theater Company.
He is an instructor at Tokyo University of the Arts, Obirin University, and Seinenza Theater Company.
sen.cmt: 余分なスペース消去、the instructor of→an instructor at、Tokyo School of Fine Arts→Tokyo University of the Artsに修正
sen.e: He is an instructor at Tokyo University of the Arts, Obirin University, and Seinenza Theater Company.
He is honorary citizen of Tokyo.
He is an honorary citizen of Tokyo.
He is an honorary citizen of Tokyo.
